law.catch_line: In connection with a charitable solicitation, a charitable organization or charitable representative...

text.section: In connection with a charitable solicitation, a charitable organization or charitable representative may not commit an act or engage in a practice that by affirmative representation or by omission is misleading about anything important to, or likely to affect, another person's decision to make a charitable contribution.
An act or practice prohibited by this section is a violation of this section, whether or not a person has been misled, deceived, or damaged.
